HANDMINIBAR.NoHandSelected: You must first select a hand for this toolbar.
HANDMINIBAR.NoPermission: You do not have sufficient permission to do that.
HANDMINIBAR.ChooseHand: Select a Hand for the Toolbar
HANDMINIBAR.NoAvailableHands: This user does not have any available hands.
HANDMINIBAR.ResetHandConfirmQuestion: Place all cards back in their original Deck?
HANDMINIBAR.HandCountSettingHint: Number of hands to display on the screen
HANDMINIBAR.DisplayHandNameSettingHint: Displays the name for the hand above the hand (useful for multiple hands)
HANDMINIBAR.HideMessagesSettingHint: Disables default Foundry messages when using the module
HANDMINIBAR.BetterChatMessagesSettingHin: Messages in Chat are displayed with card images and descriptions
HANDMINIBAR.DrawChatMessagesSettingHint: How to display a card in chat messages when drawn (Requires "Better Chat Messages" enabled)
HANDMINIBAR.PassChatMessagesSettingHint: How to display a card in chat messages when passed (Requires "Better Chat Messages" enabled)
HANDMINIBAR.ShowPlayedPlayerNamesHint: When active this will show who played the cards in the Pile (Window View)
HANDMINIBAR.BarPositionSettingHint: Select the position of the bar for all players
HANDMINIBAR.FaceUpModeSettingHint: Disables the ability to flip and shows the face when using the module
HANDMINIBAR.ChooseForGMQuestion: Choose to assign a User or Hand to this Toolbar
HANDMINIBAR.ChooseUser: Select a Player for the Toolbar
HANDMINIBAR.ResetToolbarDialogQuestion: Reset The Toolbar back to default?
HANDMINIBAR.CardClickBehaviorHint: Select what happens when a card in the bar is clicked
HANDMINIBAR.DragDropObjectError: Cannot Drop that Type of Object Here
HANDMINIBAR.FoundryVersionSupport: Your Version of Foundry Does not support this feature please upgrade
HANDMINIBAR.CardsStackShortcutHint: If a pile is chosen a button will appear above everyones hand to open a pile window
HANDMINIBAR.DraggableBarPositionSettingH: X Position of the bar only when Draggable is enabled
Y Position of the bar only when Draggable is enabled
